English.Text: "People in those stories had the chance to turn back, and never did. A spirit of adventure kept them going— and that is something we explorers should have in spades!” Galvanized, the crew agree to enter the caves. In this underworld, where day lives in permanent exile, lamps are lit, but die by turns; suffocated by forces ageless and unseen. Your men hesitate to light them again; "the old light burns the eyes of the deathless," a voice whispers, "it will anger them."
